lg.l: Hey girl, you know I have been looking for you all night, you know I wanna love you right?
I wanna kiss you, right you need to be kiss, I wanna touch you, right u need to be touch,

Come here girl, you know u look good, come here ,show me what love is and I will show u what my love is. I wanna kiss u right u need to be kiss, I wanna touch u right you be need to be touch, i wanna love u I wanna rob you.
We want everybody in here, have fun tonight, and if you all are lovers, let it be now.
put your hands up, raise your hands up to the sky, let it be now, if you r in love and u know how to love, right now.
